name: Big Trouble in Little China
overview:
Here is a hack which converts all the graphics and dialogue in Bad Dudes to represent the full “Big Trouble in Little China” experience of 80’s movie excitement! Any fans of this 80’s classic will appreciate this hack.

Hard-boiled truck driver Jack Burton gets caught in a bizarre conflict within, and underneath, San Francisco's Chinatown. An ancient Chinese prince and Chinatown crime lord has kidnapped a beautiful green-eyed woman, who is the fiancee to Jack's best friend. Jack must help his friend rescue the girl before the evil Lo Pan uses her to break the ancient curse that keeps him a fleshless and immortal spirit.
